#summary Configure Eclipse

= Windows =

  # Download Eclipse 3.6.1, unzip and create shortcut (below)
  # Install Subclipse 1.6.x (Eclipse 3.2+) - http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x

{{{
C:\apps\eclipse-3.6.1\eclipse.exe -showlocation -vmargs -Xmx1024m
}}}

= Desired Plugins =

  * Implementors http://eclipse-tools.sourceforge.net/updates/
  * Hinernate (JBoss Tools) http://download.jboss.org/jbosstools/updates/JBossTools-3.1.1.GA/ http://www.hibernate.org/subprojects/tools.html
  * Web Standard Tools (WST) - doesn't seem to be named this in Helios

= Tips =

  * Always show the Error Log view and check it and the Problems view frequently
  * When using `log4j`, tell it `-Dlog4j.debug` to find out how it is trying to configure itself
